faqs.question: How do I book a spa appointment?
faqs.answer: You can book through our website, call us at +91-XXXX-XXXX, or WhatsApp us. We offer flexible scheduling and can accommodate last-minute bookings based on availability.

faqs.question: Are therapists male or female?
faqs.answer: We have both male and female therapists. You can specify your preference during booking, and we'll arrange accordingly.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations made 24 hours before the appointment are refunded. Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a 50% cancellation fee.

faqs.question: Do you offer home spa services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer home spa and hotel spa services across Delhi NCR. Additional travel charges may apply based on your location.

faqs.question: Is there a discount for first-time customers?
faqs.answer: Yes! New customers get special discounts on their first booking. First visit offer is just ‚Çπ1,499. Contact our team for details.

faqs.question: Are your therapists certified?
faqs.answer: All our therapists are certified, trained, and experienced in their respective massage techniques. We maintain strict quality standards.

therapists.description: Our certified Russian therapists are trained in authentic Russian massage methods. A Russian massage improves blood circulation, reduces stress, eases muscle pain, and enhances skin health. Experience the same expert care whether you visit Mahipalpur, Lajpat Nagar, or any of our outlets.

Experienced Indian therapists trained in body massage and wellness treatments. Available at outlets in Noida, Aerocity, Karol Bagh, and Mahipalpur. Our Indian therapists prioritize customer comfort with complete focus on hygiene and professional care.

We have international therapists from Uzbekistan, Afghanistan, and Thailand. Choose your therapist based on preference. All are well-trained and certified to provide 100% satisfaction with international massage experience.
